name: swarm-numberformat
description: Format very large numbers in several human-readable ways. `format(1e6)` -> `"1 million"` or `"1M"`

scripts.//build: # For backwards compatibility, compile the <script>-compatible files to /dist/ instead of /umd/. There doesn't seem to be a config option for that though, so just move by hand.
scripts.build: rimraf umd dist && nwb build-web-module && mv umd dist
scripts.build-docs: esdoc && cp -rp demo docs && touch docs/.nojekyll
scripts.version: npm run build && npm run build-docs && git add -A dist docs
